metadata.name: InvoiceExtractor
metadata.description: Custom actions for extracting and processing invoice data from PDFs

post.description: Extracts key information from the PDF invoice content.

pdf_content.title: Pdf Content
pdf_content.description: The text content extracted from the PDF invoice.

schema.title: Response for Extract Invoice Data
schema.description:
A dictionary containing the extracted invoice data with keys:
- invoice_number (str): The invoice number
- customer_name (str): The name of the customer
- customer_address (str): The address of the customer
- invoice_total (float): The total amount of the invoice
- line_items (list): A list of dictionaries, each representing a line item

post.description: Presents extracted data to the user for verification and allows corrections.

extracted_data.title: Extracted Data
extracted_data.description: The dictionary of extracted invoice data.

schema.title: Response for Verify Extracted Data
schema.description: A dictionary of verified and potentially corrected invoice data.

post.description: Saves the verified invoice data to an Excel file.

verified_data.title: Verified Data
verified_data.description: The dictionary of verified invoice data.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name to use for the Excel file.

schema.title: Response for Save To Excel
schema.description: The path of the saved Excel file.
